name: Login
description: A complete user registration and social login modal

settings.name: logo_image
settings.title: Logo image
settings.description: Show this image as your logo on the sign-up and login pages.

settings.name: show_inline
settings.title: Show inline
settings.description: Show login and signup forms in page instead of as a Modal

settings.name: show_classic_login
settings.title: Allow email & password registration
settings.description: Enable email-based sign ups on your website, i.e. sign ups that don't require social login.

settings.name: show_classic_login_as_button
settings.title: Show email registration as button
settings.description: Make email registration appear as a button just like social login. Clicking this button will expand the traditional sign-up form.

settings.name: split_name_field
settings.title: Split name in two fields
settings.description: Split the name field in two fields (first name & last name).

settings.name: disable_buttons_automatically
settings.title: Visually disable submit buttons for incomplete forms
settings.description: If checked, disable the 'log in' and 'sign up' buttons when their forms are incomplete. Incomplete submissions will not be allowed regardless of the state of this option.

settings.name: show_name_field_on_sign_up
settings.title: Show name field on sign up
settings.description: If checked, show a field that asks the user for his name.

settings.name: show_sign_up_section_after
settings.title: Automatic Sign up popup delay
settings.description: This is the wait time (in seconds) before automatically showing the sign-up section to unregistered visitors (once per user). 0 seconds disables the pop-up.

settings.name: hide_thanks_section_after
settings.title: Automatically Hide thanks section delay
settings.description: This is the wait time (in seconds) before automatically hiding the thanks section (i.e. 'thanks for signing up!') once users finish registration (0 to disable).

settings.name: show_login
settings.title: Display log in link
settings.description: When logged out, show a 'log in' link.

settings.name: show_signup
settings.title: Display sign up link
settings.description: When logged out, show a 'sign up' link.

settings.name: show_profile
settings.title: Display user profile link
settings.description: When logged in, show a link to view and edit their profile.

settings.name: custom_buttons
settings.title: Custom links
settings.description: Add custom links to show when a user is logged in.

deployment_settings.name: redirect_url
deployment_settings.title: Redirect URL
deployment_settings.description: Where to redirect when login has succeeded.
